summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of ICF Hub platform completed. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend core features working with minor issues on About page and chat widget animations.

ui_bugs.issue: Chat toggle button has CSS animation (chat-bounce) causing click instability in automated tests

integration_issues.issue: Page loads (returns 200) but text=WHY selector timeout during automated testing. May be slow loading or text content issue.

passed_tests: Landing page loads with all sections
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Fix About ICF page loading issue (WHY text selector timeout), 2. Consider removing or reducing chat widget bounce animation for better stability
